DOC.brief_summary: This is single dose study of radiolabeled [14C]-ertugliflozin (PF04971729, MK-8835) in healthy male volunteers to study the absorption, distribution, metabolism and elimination of ertugliflozin.
DOC.brief_title: A Radiolabeled Mass Balance Study of [14C]-Ertugliflozin (PF04971729, MK-8835) In Healthy Male Participants (MK-8835-038)
DOC.criteria: Healthy male participants with Body Mass Index of 17.5 to 30.5 kg/m2 and a total body weight >50 kg (110 lbs) Female participants. Participants enrolled in a previous radionucleotide study or who have received radiotherapy or exposed to significant radiation within 12 months prior to screening
